item.title: Prezto's aliases for git
item.description: A few days ago, as I was having a look at the list of aliases I use with Zsh, I realized that there was a ton of aliases available that I did not created: $ alias g=git gCO='gCo $(gCl)' gCT='gCt $(gCl)' gCa='git add $(gCl)' gCe='git mergetool $(gCl)' gCl='git --no-pager diff --name-only --diff-filter=U' gCo='git checkout --ours --' gCt='git checkout --theirs --' [...] gws='git status --ignore-submodules=${_git_status_ignore_submodules} --short' gwx='git rm -r' I had two thoughts while I was examining those:
